tasks.task: Communicating about caladium care and planting.
subtasks: Discussing caladium bicolor habitat and hardiness zones.
Recommending soil conditions and plant spacing.
Advising on planting depth and orientation of caladium tubers.
Describing the process of starting caladiums indoors.
Recommending companion plants for outdoor caladiums.
Explaining the planting and care of potted caladiums.
Sharing tips for overwintering caladium tubers.
Addressing common pests and diseases affecting caladiums.
Encouraging viewer interaction and engagement on social media.
